item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://hyperforms.app/ - Create form to email and more in seconds and without backend code. The Personal account gives you up to 50 form submissions per month for free.

item.title: Add ZenRows
item.description: https://www.zenrows.com/ - Web Scraping API & proxy server that bypasses any anti-bot solution while offering javascript rendering, rotating proxies, and geotargeting. Free tier of 1000 API calls.

item.title: Added Export SDK, a PDF generator API with generous free plan.
item.description: https://exportsdk.com - - PDF generator API with drag and drop template editor that also provides an SDK and no-code integrations. Free plan comes with 250 pages per month, unlimited users and three templates.

item.title: Add Flowdash
item.description: https://flowdash.com/ - Automate business workflows. Free tier for up to 3 users, 1000 tasks, and 3 workflows.

item.title: Add Parsio.io Email Parser
item.description: https://parsio.io) — Free email parser (Forward email, extract the data, send it to your server - Free email parser (Forward email, extract the data, send it to your server)

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://numlookupapi.com - Free phone number validation API - 100k free requests / month.

item.title: add vvv.space
item.description: https://vvv.space/ - Free links manager with private/public spaces, includes slack and google docs integration and chrome plugin.
